mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (VID, UID, RATE, CONTENT, TIME, DEPTH, RE_ID) VALUES (#{vid}, #{uid}, #{rate}, #{content}, #{time}, now(), 0, #{re_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET rate = #{rate}, content = #{content}, WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, rate, content, time, depth, re_id, u.nickname FROM review r JOIN user u ON r.uid = u.id WHERE vid = #{id};
